summary: 0xSearch WhitePaper - Tired of search engines that profit from your every query? 0xSearch, the search engine built on principles of privacy, user empowerment, and community. We harness the power of multiple search providers to deliver the most comprehensive results, all while protecting your data and keeping your searches confidential. But 0xSearch is more than just privacy. Our unique 'search-to-earn' model transforms the way you search the web. With every query, you earn valuable $SEARCH tokens, giving you direct ownership and influence over the platform's future. Experience the future of internet discovery: secure, rewarding, and designed to serve your needs above all else.
